Enums/Error.html#/s:7DiceKit5ErrorO20ill.name: illegalNumberOfSides(attempt:)
Enums/Error.html#/s:7DiceKit5ErrorO20ill.abstract: A number of sides was passed that wasn’t allowed.

Enums/Error.html#/s:7DiceKit5ErrorO11emp.name: emptyString
Enums/Error.html#/s:7DiceKit5ErrorO11emp.abstract: An empty string was passed to a string parser that doesn’t accept empty strings.

Enums/Error.html#/s:7DiceKit5ErrorO16non.name: nonNumericString
Enums/Error.html#/s:7DiceKit5ErrorO16non.abstract: A string was passed with nonnumeric characters that weren’t expected.

Enums/Error.html#/s:7DiceKit5ErrorO14div.name: divisionByZero
Enums/Error.html#/s:7DiceKit5ErrorO14div.abstract: Zero was passed to something that would have divided by it.

Enums/Error.html#/s:7DiceKit5ErrorO15emp.name: emptyDictionary
Enums/Error.html#/s:7DiceKit5ErrorO15emp.abstract: An empty dictionary was passed to something that needs a non-empty dictionary.

Enums/Error.html#/s:7DiceKit5ErrorO16neg.name: negativeArgument
Enums/Error.html#/s:7DiceKit5ErrorO16neg.abstract: Arguments were passed that resulted in something being negative that needed to be positive. This doesn’t necessarily mean that the arguments passed in this case were negative, and it is possible to pass some negative arguments, as long as they cancel each other out. All this error means is that the result of a computation would have been negative.

Enums/Error.html#/s:7DiceKit5ErrorO13cha.name: chanceOverOne
Enums/Error.html#/s:7DiceKit5ErrorO13cha.abstract: The chance of something happening was over 1, an impossibility.

Enums/RollComparison.html#/s:7DiceKit14R.name: orHigher
Enums/RollComparison.html#/s:7DiceKit14R.abstract: If it is greater than or equal to the target.

Enums/RollComparison.html#/s:7DiceKit14R.name: orLower
Enums/RollComparison.html#/s:7DiceKit14R.abstract: If it is less than or equal to the target.

Enums/RollComparison.html#/s:7DiceKit14R.name: exactly
Enums/RollComparison.html#/s:7DiceKit14R.abstract: If it is exactly equal to the target.

Enums/MultipleRollResult.html#/s:7DiceKi.name: outsides
Enums/MultipleRollResult.html#/s:7DiceKi.abstract: Return the sum of the highest and the lowest roll.

Enums/MultipleRollResult.html#/s:7DiceKi.name: dropHighest
Enums/MultipleRollResult.html#/s:7DiceKi.abstract: Return the sum of everything but the highest roll.

Enums/MultipleRollResult.html#/s:7DiceKi.name: dropLowest
Enums/MultipleRollResult.html#/s:7DiceKi.abstract: Return the sum of everything except the lowest roll. This is used in Pathfinder character generation.

Enums/MultipleRollResult.html#/s:7DiceKi.name: dropOutsides
Enums/MultipleRollResult.html#/s:7DiceKi.abstract: Return the sum of everything except the highest and lowest rolls.

Enums/MultipleRollResult.html#/s:7DiceKi.name: dropLow(amountToDrop:)
Enums/MultipleRollResult.html#/s:7DiceKi.abstract: Return the sum of everything except the given number of lowest rolls.

Enums/MultipleRollResult.html#/s:7DiceKi.name: dropHigh(amountToDrop:)
Enums/MultipleRollResult.html#/s:7DiceKi.abstract: Return the sum of everything except the given number of highest rolls.

Enums/MultipleRollResult.html.name: MultipleRollResult
Enums/MultipleRollResult.html.abstract: An enum representing the type of result to return from rolling multiple times.

Enums/RollComparison.html.name: RollComparison
Enums/RollComparison.html.abstract: An enum representing a comparison between two Rolls.

Enums/Error.html.name: Error
Enums/Error.html.abstract: An enum representing any error that could be thrown during the use of DiceKit.

Structs/Chance.html#/s:7DiceKit6ChanceV6.name: oneOut(of:)
Structs/Chance.html#/s:7DiceKit6ChanceV6.abstract: Creates a new Chance object of the fraction form 1/d.

Structs/Chance.html#/s:7DiceKit6ChanceV_.name: init(_:outOf:)
Structs/Chance.html#/s:7DiceKit6ChanceV_.abstract: Creates a new Chance object of the fraction form n/d.

Structs/Chance.html#/s:7DiceKit6ChanceV8.name: init(oneOutOf:)
Structs/Chance.html#/s:7DiceKit6ChanceV8.abstract: Creates a new Chance object of the fraction form 1/d.

Structs/Chance.html#/s:7DiceKit6ChanceV1.name: init(approximating:)
Structs/Chance.html#/s:7DiceKit6ChanceV1.abstract: Creates a new Chance object approximating the given decimal.

Structs/Chance.html#/s:7DiceKit6ChanceV1.name: init(floatLiteral:)
Structs/Chance.html#/s:7DiceKit6ChanceV1.abstract: Creates a new Chance object approximating the given decimal. There is no error-checking!

Structs/Chances.html#/s:7DiceKit7Chances.name: init()
Structs/Chances.html#/s:7DiceKit7Chances.abstract: Creates a new Chances object with no data.

Structs/Chances.html#/s:7DiceKit7Chances.name: init(chances:)
Structs/Chances.html#/s:7DiceKit7Chances.abstract: Creates a new Chances object with the given chances.

Structs/Chances.html#/s:7DiceKit7Chances.name: init(chances:)
Structs/Chances.html#/s:7DiceKit7Chances.abstract: Creates a new Chances object with the given chances.

Structs/Chances.html#/s:7DiceKit7Chances.name: init(chances:)
Structs/Chances.html#/s:7DiceKit7Chances.abstract: Creates a new Chances object with the given chances.

Structs/Chances.html#/s:7DiceKit7Chances.name: subscript(of:)
Structs/Chances.html#/s:7DiceKit7Chances.abstract: The chance of the given roll occurring.

Structs/Chances.html.name: Chances
Structs/Chances.html.abstract: A struct that represents the chances of different Rolls happening.

Structs/Chance.html.name: Chance
Structs/Chance.html.abstract: A struct that represents the chance or probability of something happening.

Classes/DieSide.html#/s:7DiceKit7DieSide.name: init(_:)
Classes/DieSide.html#/s:7DiceKit7DieSide.abstract: Create a new DieSide with the given value.

Classes/DieSide.html#/s:7DiceKit7DieSide.name: value
Classes/DieSide.html#/s:7DiceKit7DieSide.abstract: The value that this DieSide will return when rolled.

Classes/CustomDie.html#/s:7DiceKit9Custo.name: sides
Classes/CustomDie.html#/s:7DiceKit9Custo.abstract: A dictionary that maps the rolls of the die to the DieSides passed to the initializer

Classes/CustomDie.html#/s:7DiceKit9Custo.name: replacing(_:with:)
Classes/CustomDie.html#/s:7DiceKit9Custo.abstract: Creates a new CustomDie, replacing one side with a new one.

Classes/CustomDie.html#/s:7DiceKit9Custo.name: init(_:)
Classes/CustomDie.html#/s:7DiceKit9Custo.abstract: Creates a new CustomDie with the given sides.

Classes/CustomDie.html#/s:7DiceKit9Custo.name: init(sides:)
Classes/CustomDie.html#/s:7DiceKit9Custo.abstract: Creates a new CustomDie with the given sides.

Classes/CustomDie.html#/s:7DiceKit9Custo.name: init(copyOf:)
Classes/CustomDie.html#/s:7DiceKit9Custo.abstract: Creates a new CustomDie that is a copy of the given CustomDie.

Classes/CustomDie.html#/s:7DiceKit9Custo.name: copy()
Classes/CustomDie.html#/s:7DiceKit9Custo.abstract: Returns a copy of the given CustomDie with separate memory.

Classes/CustomDie.html.name: CustomDie
Classes/CustomDie.html.abstract: A class that allows for dice with custom sides instead of numbers.

Classes/DieSide.html.name: DieSide
Classes/DieSide.html.abstract: A class that masks a side, returning a custom value in lieu of a number.

Results.html#/s:7DiceKit4Rolla.name: Roll
Results.html#/s:7DiceKit4Rolla.abstract: The result of any roll method from any Rollable type.

Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.name: chances
Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.abstract: The rolls and the chances of them occurring.

Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.name: init(chances:)
Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.abstract: Creates a new WeightedDie with the given rolls and chances of them occurring.

Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.name: init(copyOf:)
Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.abstract: Creates a new WeightedDie that is a copy of the given WeightedDie.

Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.name: roll()
Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.abstract: Rolls this WeightedDie and returns the result as a Roll.

Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.name: minimumResult
Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.abstract: The minimum possible result from using the roll() method.

Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.name: maximumResult
Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.abstract: The maximum possible result from using the roll() method.

Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.name: doubleAverageResult
Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.abstract: The exact (double) average result from using the roll() method.

Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.name: averageResult
Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.abstract: The average result from using the roll() method.

Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.name: canReach(_:_:)
Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.abstract: Determines whether this WeightedDie can reach the target Roll using the given comparison type.

Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.name: copy()
Classes/WeightedDie.html#/s:7DiceKit11We.abstract: Returns a copy of the given WeightedDie with separate memory.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4diceSD.name: dice
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4diceSD.abstract: The dice that make up this collection, along with how many times they appear.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C08numbe.name: numberOfDice
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C08numbe.abstract: The number of dice in this Dice instance.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C8modifi.name: modifier
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C8modifi.abstract: The modifier added or subtracted from these Dice

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0CyAcA3Di.name: init(_:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0CyAcA3Di.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the specified dice.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4diceAC.name: init(dice:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4diceAC.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the specified dice.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_5count.name: init(_:count:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_5count.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the given number of the specified die. This is essentially identical to Dice(copyOf: die * count), but is more efficient.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0CyAcA3Di.name: init(_:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0CyAcA3Di.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the specified dice. They should be in a (die: Die, count: Int) form, with the die being the type of die to add, and the count being the number of times to add it.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_12with.name: init(_:withModifier:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_12with.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the specified dice and modifier

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4dice12.name: init(dice:withModifier:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4dice12.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the specified dice and modifier

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_5count.name: init(_:count:withModifier:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_5count.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the given number of the specified die, along with the specified modifier. This is essentially identical to Dice(copyOf: (die * count) + modifier), but is more efficient.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_12with.name: init(_:withModifier:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_12with.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the specified dice and modifier. The dice should be in a (die: Die, count: Int) form, with the die being the type of die to add, and the count being the number of times to add it.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0CyACSSKc.name: init(_:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0CyACSSKc.abstract: Creates a new Dice object from the specified string in dice notation.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C6copyOf.name: init(copyOf:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C6copyOf.abstract: Creates a new Dice object that is a copy of the given Dice object.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C13minim.name: minimumResult
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C13minim.abstract: The minimum possible result from using the roll() method.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C13maxim.name: maximumResult
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C13maxim.abstract: The maximum possible result from using the roll() method.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C13avera.name: averageResult
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C13avera.abstract: The average result from using the roll() method.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C8canRea.name: canReach(_:_:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C8canRea.abstract: Determines whether this Dice object can reach the target Roll using the given comparison type.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C16debug.name: debugDescription
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C16debug.abstract: A short, debug-usable description of this Dice object.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4copyAC.name: copy()
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4copyAC.abstract: Returns a copy of the given Dice with separate memory.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C1poiyA2.abstract: Adds some Dice and a Die together, creating a new Dice object.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C1poiyAc.abstract: Adds some Dice and a Die together, creating a new Dice object.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C1poiyA2.abstract: Adds some Dice together, creating a new Dice object.
Adds the given dice to the given Dice object.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C1poiyAc.abstract: Adds the given dice to the given Dice object.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C1moiyA2.abstract: Multiplies the given Dice object by the given multiplier.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C1moiyAC.abstract: Multiplies the given Dice object by the given multiplier.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC5sidesS.name: sides
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC5sidesS.abstract: The number of sides on this Die. This value does not need to be possible (for example, it can be 13), but it does need to be larger than 0.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC5sidesA.name: init(sides:)
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC5sidesA.abstract: Creates a new Die with the given number of sides.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieCyACSSKc.name: init(_:)
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieCyACSSKc.abstract: Creates a new Die from the given string in dice notation.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC6copyOf.name: init(copyOf:)
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC6copyOf.abstract: Creates a new Die that is a copy of the given Die.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC4rollSi.name: roll()
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC4rollSi.abstract: Rolls this Die and returns the result as a Roll.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC13minim.name: minimumResult
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC13minim.abstract: The minimum possible result from using the roll() method.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC13maxim.name: maximumResult
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC13maxim.abstract: The maximum possible result from using the roll() method.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC19doubl.name: doubleAverageResult
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC19doubl.abstract: The exact (double) average result from using the roll() method.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC13avera.name: averageResult
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC13avera.abstract: The average result from using the roll() method.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC8canRea.name: canReach(_:_:)
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC8canRea.abstract: Determines whether this Die can reach the target Roll using the given comparison type.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC4copyAC.name: copy()
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC4copyAC.abstract: Returns a copy of the given Die with separate memory.

Protocols/Rollable.html#/s:7DiceKit8Roll.name: roll()
Protocols/Rollable.html#/s:7DiceKit8Roll.abstract: Rolls this object and returns the result.

Protocols/Rollable.html#/s:7DiceKit8Roll.name: roll(times:_:)
Protocols/Rollable.html#/s:7DiceKit8Roll.abstract: Rolls this object the given number of times and returns the given result type.

Protocols/Rollable.html#/s:7DiceKit8Roll.name: minimumResult
Protocols/Rollable.html#/s:7DiceKit8Roll.abstract: The minimum possible result from using the roll() method.

Protocols/Rollable.html#/s:7DiceKit8Roll.name: maximumResult
Protocols/Rollable.html#/s:7DiceKit8Roll.abstract: The maximum possible result from using the roll() method.

Protocols/Rollable.html#/s:7DiceKit8Roll.name: averageResult
Protocols/Rollable.html#/s:7DiceKit8Roll.abstract: The average result from using the roll() method.

Protocols/Rollable.html#/s:7DiceKit8Roll.name: canReach(_:_:)
Protocols/Rollable.html#/s:7DiceKit8Roll.abstract: Determines whether or not this object can reach the target Roll, compared by the given comparison.

Protocols/Rollable.html.name: Rollable
Protocols/Rollable.html.abstract: An object that is rollable. It must have a roll() method that returns a Roll object.

Classes/Dice.html.name: Dice
Classes/Dice.html.abstract: A collection of Die objects and/or a modifier that can be rolled using the roll() method.

Classes/WeightedDie.html.name: WeightedDie
Classes/WeightedDie.html.abstract: A representation of a weighted die; i.e. a die whose sides do not necessarily have the same chance of being rolled.

Other%20Typealiases.html.name: Other Type Aliases
Other%20Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
